title: Arclight Yorick Feedback
body:
The Health Bar on W needs to be recolored to a white and gold color. 

https://image.prntscr.com/image/cagJBLI0RqGZm-SFS4ogjg.png

The model of the  Mist Walker in his Joke animation needs to be replaced with the Mist Walkers from the skin. 

https://image.prntscr.com/image/aBj2prz-Quq53pTdhINnlQ.png

https://image.prntscr.com/image/MpxXiuyORGOt2f2l_WSnfw.png

That's all. Took long enough to get here. I'd hope we NEVER Have to wait this long again. But otherwise it's fantastic :)

replies.body:
First time I saw or even heard of this and if this is a real skin, it looks pretty cool though I'm also somewhat sad that the Dragon Sorcerer Yorick skin is just a hoax.

Yorick would be pretty awesome with a dragon theme.

Dragon slayer Shen it is

That teaser destroyed me after we learned it was for Janna
My disappointment was abated when I realize they're gutting Janna in the same patch so I can never see her again
Lets ALL hope next dragon skin is the legendary DragonMaster {{champion:50}}
People wanted it to be Ultimate not Legendary.

>also somewhat sad that the Dragon Sorcerer Yorick skin is just a hoax.

That one was such a joke.  It said we'd be getting an Eve skin when she isn't eligible for one until AFTER her VGU.  Plus it was the same one that said "Believer Taliyah" ... yah, "believing" that she'd get a skin called that lel

I *really* like what they did with the Maiden.  When I heard "Arclight Yorick," I don't know what I was expecting the Maiden to look like, but whatever it was this one is better.  Literally, overall the skin is good, but the ult alone makes me want to pick up Yorick.  

My one suggestion is that they make the Maiden's neck turn when she's attacking so that she's always looking at her target.
Not gonna lie i dont think the color on wall will change. Clarity and all that. Health is almost always green. (Almost i know Colorblind and such change it.)
id rather the wall health stay grenn..might be hard to tell if it was all yellow

What we've seen, I believe, is the pre-release. So those changes could be planned to happen. They still have two weeks to release. I love Yorick and I think the skin is pretty good. They only thing  that was off to me at first is the face. It just seemed weird to me, but as long as the splash is good, I don't mind.
CAN.NOT.WAIT. for you guys to see the splash. It's gorgeous, one of my favs of any we've ever done. PREPARE!

Hey! Sorry to disturb. I just saw the splash art for the skin, and I am amazed. One quick question though... What are the chances his ingame helm might be changed to match the art? I feel like the skin would be better if that were the case. in case you're wondering what I'm talking about, here's an example:  https://imgur.com/dneBxEc   
You don't have to answer, I'm just curious. Thanks!

Everytime I see this I want them to delay this damn skin. Fix up what NEEDS to be fixed and release it when its worth 1350. Cause as right now I wouldnt touch this skin with a ten foot pole. I may come off as entitled but atleast try to match up the splash and ingame skin. I shouldnt have to adjust my brightness to play a skin...
I still wish Undertaker Yorick was more worth its 975 RP price tag. All it does is change his model :^(

Undertaker Yorick is a 520 RP skin.
https://image.prntscr.com/image/hggDBzoJSnagJtoPfeMT4g.png
They could probably change the health bar of the W only for Yorick and his team otherwise it might cause clarity issues.

I disagree I think that Riot needs to add new sound effects to the mist walkers and well as the Maiden and well as Yorick for this skin really to hit home base. I mean the skin doesn't feel right if Yorick's talking about Mist when he is using light
I am in love with this skin. I just wish that yellows on his head are a tiny bit more desaturated.

I am simple man, I see Yorick skin, I like. 

But.... NO FUR. The Yorick skin will look less like King of Clubs Morde.
